00029 class DynamicContext;
00030 class EventHandler;
00031 class ASTNode;
00032 class QueryPathNode;
00033 
00034 class XQILLA_API EventGenerator : public ReferenceCounted
00035 {
00036 public:
00037   typedef RefCountPointer<EventGenerator> Ptr;
00038 
00039   virtual ~EventGenerator() {}
00040 
00043   virtual EventGenerator::Ptr generateEvents(EventHandler *events, DynamicContext *context) = 0;
00044 
00045   static void generateAndTailCall(const EventGenerator::Ptr &generator, EventHandler *events,
00046                                   DynamicContext *context)
00047   {
00048     EventGenerator::Ptr gen = generator;
00049     while(gen.notNull()) {
00050       gen = gen->generateEvents(events, context);
00051     }
00052   }
00053 
00054 };

00062 
00063 protected:

00065   bool preserveNS_, preserveType_;
